name: D-Bronzi™ Bronzing Drops with Peptides
about: What it is: This antioxidant-rich, peptide-infused serum delivers a bronzy wash of color while boosting skin’s elasticity and supporting healthy barrier function...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness..Formulation: Lightweight Liquid..Highlighted Ingredients:.-Cocoa Extract: Provides powerful antioxidant and soothing benefits..-Matrixyl 3000 Peptide Blend: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while promoting elasticity and resilience..-Chronocyclin: This chronopeptide mimics the antioxidant benefits of vitamin D...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: With a chronopeptide that mimics vitamin D’s antioxidant benefits, D-Bronzi flatters every complexion—without the sun damage...Like our other color serum drops O-Bloos and B-Goldi, D-Bronzi is designed to be mixed with any Drunk Elephant moisturizer or serum to add the prettiest hint of color...This serum is free of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance...Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the health of the skin or support the integrity of their formulations. The brand focuses on healthy pH levels, formulations the skin recognizes, small molecular structure that’s easily absorbed, and effective active ingredients that also support the skin’s acid mantle. All of their products are designed to be mixed together—what Drunk Elephant calls making a smoothie. (This is true for all of their products except their sunscreen, Umbra, which sits on top of the skin, protecting it from UV damage.) The result is skin that is reset to its happiest, healthiest state...Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free...Clinical Results:.In a consumer-perception study with 32 people after 28 days:.-90% agreed skin felt smooth.-87% agreed skin felt soothed and hydrated......Allure
ingredients: -Cocoa Extract: Provides powerful antioxidant and soothing benefits.  .-Matrixyl 3000 Peptide Blend: Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles while promoting elasticity and resilience. .-Chronocyclin: This chronopeptide mimics the antioxidant benefits of vitamin D....Water, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Glyceryl Oleate Citrate, Mica, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glycerin, Ribes Nigrum (Black Currant) Seed Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Lecithin, Acetyl Tetrapeptide-17, Linoleic Acid, Linolenic Acid, Sorbitan Isostearate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Maltodextrin, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Magnolia Officinalis Bark Extract, Glutamylamidoethyl Imidazole, Colloidal Platinum [Nano], Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Sorbic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Boron Nitride, Hexylene Glycol, Polysorbate 60, Ethylhexylglycerin, CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), CI 77492 (Iron Oxides), CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate...The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Shake before use. .-Add a drop or more to any Drunk Elephant serum, oil, or cream for a gorgeous glow and a potent dose of protective antioxidants and omega fatty acids peptides..-For best dispensing, store upside down....Tip: .-May be applied to face, chest, legs, or anywhere else you want a touch of bronze....Skincare Smoothie:.-Try a Drunk Elephant Glow Big Smoothie by mixing 1 drop D-Bronzi™ + 1 pump C-Firma™ Fresh + 1 pump B-Hydra™  in the palm of your hand and applying all at once for a just-got-back-from-somewhere-sunny glow. .-Don't forget to top it off with Umbra Sheer™ for mineral SPF 30 protection (each product sold separately).

reviews.review_title: Not long lasting, doesn't work well with sunscreen
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw so many amazing reviews online, so I couldn't resist trying this product. Sadly, I was disappointed and will not be repurchasing.  D-Bronzi does not work well if you wear sunscreen. First, I tried applying this (mixed with moisturizer) before my sunscreen. But once I put on my sunscreen, it smeared the D-Bronzi around and made it look uneven. Second, I tried applying it after my sunscreen, but it turned out really patchy and did not blend well. (I tried this method when mixing the D-Bronzi with moisturizer as directed and then without moisturizer, because moisturizer on top of sunscreen is weird. The D-Bronzi and sunscreen combo did not work, either with or without mixing it with moisturizer.) Third, I tried mixing it with the actual sunscreen, but it came out patchy again. I tried these methods with 3 different facial sunscreens and it still turned out uneven or patchy. On the rare occasions that it looked fine with sunscreen, it would melt off/smear around my face after about an hour (presumably due to the formulations of sunscreen).  If you're not wearing sunscreen, this product looks great when first applied to the skin (mixed with moisturizer) because it gives a pretty, tinted glow. However, its effects do not last very long. After a couple hours, the color begins to fade. I've worn this for short term events, like going out to dinner, and it was just fine! But this is not something that you can wear all day to work or school and expect it to look good for more than a couple hours.  I will not be repurchasing this product. It does not work with any sunscreen I own (which I wear daily), and it doesn't last very long. I've found other bronzers that work well with sunscreen and are longer lasting. I'm sure there's some combination of moisturizer and sunscreen out there that works well with this product, but I am not going to experiment and change my entire skincare routine just to accommodate this one product, especially if I can find better substitutes.
